husband, Mark Kelly, on Saturday night. The astronaut described the latest progress in his wife's recovery after the Jan. 8 shooting. "She's making progress every day," Kirsten Gillibrand said. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing. So... it's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury that she did. Gabrielle Giffords was the primary target in the attack outside a Safeway market in Tucson, where the Arizona Democrat had gone to meet with constituents.
